name: Ingolfable
description:
GMTK Game Jam 2020 submission.

A short and fun golfing experience with a broken ball that won't do quite what you expect everytime so be careful!

  • 15 unique levels to complete
  • The ball can "break" in 6 different ways so be careful with your strokes
  • Wind and Sand will alter your ball's velocity so be sure to keep them in mind
  • Be careful not to jump into the void though
